request.description:
Event for sending an email

Data format : 

{
	event : "email.create",
	data : {
		"to" : "",
		"subject":"",
		"content" : ""
	}
}

Event for sending a web notification

Data format : 

{
	event : "web.notification.create",
	data : {
		"reference" : "",
		"reference_id" : "",
		"title" : "",
		"participants" : [{
			"patient":"",
			"content":""
		},{
			"careprovider":"",
			"content":""
		}]
	}
}

Event for creating an activity log

Data format : 

{
	event : "activity.log.created",
	data : {
		"patient":"",
		"log_date":"",
		"created_on":"",
		"participants" : [{
			"careprovider":"",
			"care_time":""
		},{
			"careprovider":"",
			"care_time":""
		}]
	}
}
Role should be "care-provider" / "patient" / "admin"
